meta.title: Gallicus - Craft Brewery
meta.description: Craft brewery located in Gatineau, Quebec. Discover our microbrewery beers, brewed with passion.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: Craft Brewery
about.description: Gallicus is a craft brewery located in Gatineau, Quebec. We brew beers with character, passion, and creativity, in small batches to ensure quality and freshness in every product.
about.philosophy: Our philosophy is simple: create authentic beers that reflect our terroir and our love of the craft. Each recipe is carefully developed using quality ingredients to deliver unique and memorable flavors.

beers.title: Our Beers
beers.emptyState: No beers available at the moment.
